name: Seated Leg Press
description: A compound exercise for quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings using a leg press machine.
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart. Push the platform away by extending your knees, then slowly return.

back_issue_restrictions.recommendation: Keep lower back flat against the seat pad and avoid excessive depth.
